metadata.title: CVE-2018-6519 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The SAML2 library before 1.10.4, 2.x before 2.3.5, and 3.x before 3.1.1 in SimpleSAMLphp has a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability for fraction-of-seconds data in a timestamp.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
